Fitting result
==============

After successful fitting, the variable ``fit`` is pushed to the console. This object is an instance of the class **FitResult**
which provides access to fitted parameters and additional methods, such as confidence intervals estimation.



.. autoclass:: fitwidget.FitResult
	:members:
